attributes.action: Utilise the Governments shareholding in HBOS to attempt to reverse the changes to Halifax current account terms and conditions due to come into effect on 6th December 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The scheduled changes include inter alia a daily charege for authorised overdrafts of £1 (in effect 36500% Apr for being 1p overdrawn) and a zero rate of credit interest.

It is suggested that such a one sided and extortionate charging system is not appropriate for an organisation that has been heavily subsidised by the taxpayer and should be reconsidered without delay

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
